languages.text: "Также на Даргонусе заседают несколько благородных семейств, заправляющих крупнейшими планетами протектората. Выражу свое нескромное мнение — их мало заботит, кто именно стоит у руля. Собственная выгода интересует этих пираний едва ли не больше, чем благополучие всего протектората".

traits.locale_text: "Также на Даргонусе заседают несколько благородных семейств, заправляющих крупнейшими планетами торговой империи. Выражу свое нескромное мнение — их мало заботит, кто именно стоит у руля. Собственная выгода интересует этих пираний едва ли не больше, чем благополучие всей торговой империи".

languages.text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."
languages.original_text: "Также на Даргонусе заседают несколько благородных семейств, заправляющих крупнейшими планетами протектората. Выражу свое нескромное мнение — их мало заботит, кто именно стоит у руля. Собственная выгода интересует этих пираний едва ли не больше, чем благополучие всего протектората".

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all major planets in the trade empire. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits as much as they do about the wellbeing of the trade empire itself — if not more."

"Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all major planets in the trade empire. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits as much as they do about the wellbeing of the trade empire itself — if not more."

"Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the trade empire. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the trade empire itself, if not more."

"Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the trade empire. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the trade empire itself, if not more."

"Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

languages.text: “达戈努斯是多个贵族家族的所在地，这些贵族家族负责管理王朝所有主要行星。如果您允许我表达我不太谦逊的意见，我想说，他们不太在乎王朝的统治者是谁。那群食人鱼在乎的是他们自己的利益，正如他们在乎的只有王朝本身的繁荣一样。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯是多个贵族家族的所在地，这些贵族家族负责管理王朝所有主要行星。如果您允许我表达我不太谦逊的意见，我想说，他们不太在乎王朝的统治者是谁。那群食人鱼在乎的是他们自己的利益，正如他们在乎的只有王朝本身的繁荣一样。”

languages.text: «Dargonus también es la sede de varias familias nobles que dirigen los planetas principales del protectorado. Si me permite expresar mi no tan humilde opinión, no les importa gran cosa quién esté al mando. Estas pirañas piensan en su propia prosperidad tanto o más que en la del protectorado».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: «Dargonus también es la sede de varias familias nobles que dirigen los planetas principales del protectorado. Si me permite expresar mi no tan humilde opinión, no les importa gran cosa quién esté al mando. Estas pirañas piensan en su propia prosperidad tanto o más que en la del protectorado».

languages.text: 「また、ダルゴナスには保護領内の主要な惑星を治める貴族家系が多く滞在しています。私の意見を言わせていただければ、彼らは指導者が誰であるかなど、ほとんど気にしていません。保護国そのものの繁栄と同じくらい…いえ、それ以上に自分たちの利益のことを考えるピラニアのような者たちです」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: 「また、ダルゴナスには保護領内の主要な惑星を治める貴族家系が多く滞在しています。私の意見を言わせていただければ、彼らは指導者が誰であるかなど、ほとんど気にしていません。保護国そのものの繁栄と同じくらい…いえ、それ以上に自分たちの利益のことを考えるピラニアのような者たちです」

languages.text: "Außerdem ist Dargonus der Sitz mehrerer Adelsfamilien, die alle größeren Planeten im Protektorat leiten. Meiner nicht ganz so bescheidenen Meinung nach interessiert es sie herzlich wenig, wer genau an der Spitze steht. Diesen Piranhas ist ihr eigener Profit ebenso wichtig wie der Wohlstand des Protektorats selbst, wenn nicht wichtiger."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem ist Dargonus der Sitz mehrerer Adelsfamilien, die alle größeren Planeten im Protektorat leiten. Meiner nicht ganz so bescheidenen Meinung nach interessiert es sie herzlich wenig, wer genau an der Spitze steht. Diesen Piranhas ist ihr eigener Profit ebenso wichtig wie der Wohlstand des Protektorats selbst, wenn nicht wichtiger."

languages.text: « Dargonus accueille également le siège de plusieurs familles nobles qui sont à la tête des différentes planètes majeures du protectorat. Pardonnez ma franchise, mais elles se moquent de savoir qui tient la barre. Ces charognes se soucient autant de leurs propres profits que de la prospérité du protectorat, si ce n'est plus. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: « Dargonus accueille également le siège de plusieurs familles nobles qui sont à la tête des différentes planètes majeures du protectorat. Pardonnez ma franchise, mais elles se moquent de savoir qui tient la barre. Ces charognes se soucient autant de leurs propres profits que de la prospérité du protectorat, si ce n'est plus. »

languages.text: "Dargonus, ayrıca bu protektoranın tüm büyük gezegenlerini yöneten birkaç soylu ailenin de merkezidir. Size pek de naçizane olmayan görüşümü dile getirmeme müsaade buyurursanız aileler, aslında kimin başta olduğunu pek umursamaz. Bu piranalar, protektoranın refahını düşündükleri kadar kendi elde ettikleri kârı da düşünür. Hatta kâr endişeleri daha bile fazla denebilir."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is also the seat of several noble families who run all the major planets in the protectorate. If I may express my not-so-humble opinion, they care very little about who exactly stands at the helm. Those piranhas think about their own profits just as much as they do about the prosperity of the protectorate itself, if not more."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus ayrıca bu protektoranın tüm büyük gezegenlerini yöneten birkaç soylu ailenin de merkezi. Size pek de naçizane olmayan görüşümü dile getirebilirsem, bu aileler aslında kimin başta olduğunu pek umursamıyor. Bu piranalar, protektoranın refahını düşündükleri kadar kendi elde ettikleri kârı da düşünüyor. Hatta kâr endişeleri daha bile fazla denebilir."
